data.name: Beat Saber: Lady Gaga - 'Born This Way'
data.detailed_description:
Get the track 'Born This Way' by Lady Gaga and slash the beats! This track is part of the Lady Gaga Music Pack, brought to you by Interscope Records.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
